clues.text: "Walk This Way" is the title of an autobiography & a hit tune by this rock band

clues.response: Pay unto Caesar what is Caesar's (Render unto Caesar what is Caesar's)

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are words or short phrases we have used often enough that they have become synonymous with those people.)

rounds.text: The cartographic feature from which this country gets its name passes near the town of Guayllabamba
